snippet: You could probably argue that the regular-season outcomes of the two New York area football teams had nothing to do with the University of Massachusetts or everything to do with it.
abstract: You could probably argue that the regular-season outcomes of the two New York area football teams had nothing to do with the University of Massachusetts or everything to do with it.
lead_paragraph: "We talk to the staff up there, they do a good job. I like to think we get good information as well. I try to help them out when I can with favors." Jets General Manager Mike Tannenbaum on his connections at UMass, in a Star-Ledger article last year.
